trans-unit.source: A service behavior that enables you to specify the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs within a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: En tjenestevirkemåte som gjør at du kan angi hva som skal skje når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak i en Arbeidsflyttjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> and WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> does not.
trans-unit.target: Begge <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>og WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior angir virkemåten til kjøretiden når et unntak ikke behandles i arbeidsflyten; WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior har imidlertid alternativet mens en avbrutte arbeidsflyt i vedvarende lager mens <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>ikke.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is not.
trans-unit.target: Årsak til dette er at hva skjer med en avbrutte arbeidsflyt vert-spesifikke og <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>ikke.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: To implement this functionality using <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, create a custom <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> that has this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementere denne funksjonaliteten ved hjelp av <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, Opprett en egendefinert <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant>som har dette problemet.</xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this behavior see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel på hvordan du bruker dette problemet kan du se [arbeidsflyten Service databehandling utvidelse](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir handlingen som skal utføres når det oppstår et ubehandlet unntak.

trans-unit.source: The Action property can be set to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction> values.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen kan settes til én av de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction>verdier.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints exposed by the service.
trans-unit.target: Endepunkt eksponert av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters required to implement the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen-parametere som kreves for å implementere virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.
